pages.text: By placing at least one or more $(item)Water Bottles$() in the lower three slots of the $(l:useables/brewing_stand)$(item)Brewing Stand$(), an ingredient in the upper slot, and $(item)Blaze Powder$() in the fuel slot, a $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$() can distill the ingredients into each $(l:brewing/ingredients_equipments)$(item)Bottle$() and brew $(l:brewing/brewing#potions)$(item)Potions$() that may be consumed to grant an effect to the $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Player$().

pages.title: Base Potions
pages.text: Base potions are $(l:brewing/brewing#potions)$(item)Potions$() without effects, brewed by adding a single base ingredient to a $(item)Water Bottle$(). Of these, only the $(item)Awkward Potion$() can be imbued with an effect ingredient to produce a $(l:brewing/effects)$(thing)Potion Effect$().

pages.title: Effect Potions
pages.text: $(l:brewing/brewing#potions)$(item)Potions$() are bottled substances which give $(l:creatures/human-player)$(thing)Players$() and mobs a limited-time or instant status effect if drunk or within its splash radius when thrown (in the case of $(l:brewing/potion_types)$(item)Lingering$() and $(l:brewing/potion_types)$(item)Splash Potions$()).

pages.title: Potion Upgrades
pages.text: Upgrading a $(l:brewing/brewing#potions)$(item)Potion$() involves a trade-off between duration & potency. An enhanced effect has shorter duration, & extended duration cannot have an enhanced effect.
